title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(glue)
library(clipr)
```

```{r}
from_clips <- read_tsv(here("clips_nro4.WBY"), n_max = 16) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pull(email) %>%
  str_c(collapse = " ") %>%
  write_clip()

  select(student, email) %>% 
  mutate(student = student %>% str_to_title()) %>% 
  separate(student, into = c("last", "other"), sep = "; ") %>% 
  unite(name, other, last, sep = " ") %>% 
  glue_data("{name} <{email}>") %>% 
  str_c(collapse = ", ") %>% 
  write_clip()
  
```
